DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect saw palmetto sanmiaoshan , top alpha blocker , urinary flow rate BPH symptoms patient BPH .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Saw Palmetto Sanmiaoshan Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia Chinese Patients
DOC.criteria: Age 50 80 year old Clinically diagnose BPH : Suffered low urinary tract symptom IPSS > =8 Detectable prostatic enlargement determine DRE Urinary flow 5 15ml/second total void volume > =150mL Serum PSA level less 4ng/ml 410 ng/ml percent free PSA > 25 % > =4 cancer exclude biopsy Acute retention urine Congestive heart failure , unstable angina , arrhythmia , myocardial infraction Prostatic surgery Prostatic malignancy Gastrointestinal disease Renal impairment serum creatinine > 140 umol/l Hepatic disorder
